title: Part (a)(i)
stimulusHtml: Select point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe one potential environmental problem that could result from rain falling on a sanitary landfill, such as:
The response describes one potential environmental problem that could result from rain falling on a sanitary landfill, such as:

title: Part (a)(ii)
stimulusHtml: Select point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe one potential solution to the problem from part (a)(i), such as:

title: Part (a)(iii)
stimulusHtml:
Select point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.

The response does not earn a point for proposing new or improved municipal recycling programs.
descriptions: The response does not propose a solution to reduce the amount of MSW disposed of in sanitary landfills, such as:
The response proposes a solution to reduce the amount of MSW disposed of in sanitary landfills, such as:

title: Part (a)(iv)
stimulusHtml:
Select point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.

The response does not earn a point for justifying the solution with the explanation that the amount of MSW that needs to be disposed of in a landfill will be reduced.
descriptions: The response does not justify the solution proposed in part (a)(iii) with a benefit other than reducing the amount of MSW disposed of in a landfill.
The response justifies the solution proposed in part (a)(iii) with a benefit other than reducing the amount of MSW disposed of in a landfill.

title: Part (b)(i)
stimulusHtml:
Select point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.

The students must show their work for full credit. Students do not need to include units in the setup.
